DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess efficacy of a human monoclonal antibody against Hepatitis C (MBL-HCV1) combined with telaprevir [part 1: an HCV protease inhibitor] or sofosbuvir [part 2: an HCV NS5B polymerase inhibitor] in a 56 day treatment duration in patients undergoing liver transplantation due to chronic HCV infection. There is an option for extended study treatment through 84 days if viral load is undetectable at day 56.
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Study of the Efficacy and Safety of MBL-HCV1 in Combination With Oral Direct-Acting Antivirals in Patients Undergoing Liver Transplantation for Hepatitis C
